title: Shafali Verma & Laura Wolvaardt Power Velocity to Thrilling Win Over Supernovas in Womenâ€™s T20 Challenge
content:
The Women's T20 Challenge saw a thrilling encounter between Supernovas and Velocity, with Velocity emerging victorious in a nail-biting finish.  Shafali Verma and Laura Wolvaardt were the stars of the show for Velocity, showcasing their batting prowess to chase down a challenging target. 

Shafali Verma's blistering half-century laid the foundation for Velocity's chase, while Laura Wolvaardt's composed finishing touches ensured a comfortable win.  The match was filled with exciting moments, including Harmanpreet Kaur's valiant 71 runs for Supernovas, and some stunning fielding efforts. 

This victory puts Velocity in a strong position in the tournament, while Supernovas will need to regroup for their next match. The Women's T20 Challenge continues to be a captivating spectacle, with incredible talent on display.
author: Scroll Staff
